name: Nostalgic Paradigm
description:
Version 1.0 
 - The game is live!
 - Controller support available!

Growing up is something we're all eager to do until it hits us.  Now, as you have grown, you've begun to appreciate the treasures you've lost from your past, never to be held again. 

Nostalgic Paradigm is a narrative-driven walking sim based on the fear of growing up and coming to terms with never being able to re-experience the memories you made when you were younger. The friends you made playing online games, the first time you stayed up late, the marathons you had doing what you love. 

Although you can still do all these things and much more now that you've grown up, the thrill of doing these things for the first time when you didn't have a care in the world is long gone. You're used to it. There are new thrills to be made in adulthood, of course, but this game's goal is to try and make you reminisce about all those memories you made when you were younger, to help you find a newfound appreciation for them.

Credits
Developer - Levi Stenton
Playtester 1 - Stuart Creighton
Playtester 2 - Josh Gunston
